website_summaries.verdict: This 4K Blu-ray player will make your movie collection look and sound better than ever, and is at its best when paired with an HDR display and premium sound system.
pros: Produces more lifelike and saturated colors
cons: It is no surprise that the best model available is also the priciest

customer_reviews.title: Very nice upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from the X800, I’m impressed with the 4K up-conversion and mechanical quality. Finally a display window, much easier than using the remote to track time. I was aware of the lack of auto-detect for the Dolby Vision before buying, but all thats needed is a software update from Sony to get that feature. The lack of auto-detect is not a show stopper for me, my review is based on the overall system, not just one feature
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: that this was not handled good at all.
customer_reviews.text: The picture started to look nice but due to the damaged condition of the main box it may not have worked good for very long.
customer_reviews.author: David R. Hall

customer_reviews.title: no difference than the Marantz blu ray and have. returned it back. looking for something better.
customer_reviews.text: not much different in video and audio quality comparing to Marantz UD7007, too much to pay for no improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed Elaoudiy

customer_reviews.title: Buggy software made it impossible to set up
customer_reviews.text: Home screen would not display to HDMI output, buggy software made it impossible to use.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald L. Wesselmann

customer_reviews.title: Limited streaming app selection and no bluetooth keyboard support.
customer_reviews.text: What otherwise would have been a great product is marred by lack of some popular streaming apps and no support for a bluetooth keyboard, for doing searches on youtube and other streaming apps. We are otherwise stuck with the clunky on-screen keyboard, hunting for letters.
customer_reviews.author: Birdy Cephon

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: My main reason to purchase this was for the audio - including SACDs. It sounds great! I'll check out the video quality another time, but I did at least look at a few scenes from a blu-ray to see that it looks fine.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful player
customer_reviews.text: I love my 4K however it might just me cause I play Blu ray and dvd I notice little change depending when the film was produced but at the end I still love it
customer_reviews.author: James D. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if 4K player is worth buying or not.
customer_reviews.text: The unit has frozen or turned off 3 times while watching movies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing picture!
customer_reviews.text: This player is perfect! Upscales blu ray discs to near 4K ultra quality. 4K ultra discs are unbelievable. Worth the $$.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Picture and Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: Works very well with new "VAVA 4K UHD Laser TV Home Theatre Projector" for picture and older 5.2 channel Sony STR-DH50 Receiver for sound.
customer_reviews.author: SSJS

customer_reviews.title: Very nice unit but would have preferred the pandora app.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit because it had analog outputs to supply my 2nd and 3rd zone speakers in my older receiver. The video is great as is the audio quality. The only thing I wasn't happy about is Pandora was not one of the supplied Apps as my UBP800 does
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sony UBP-X1100ES 4K UHD Blu-ray Player with HDR
customer_reviews.text: I have not been a big fan of Sony products as they usually do not live for more than a couple years. But I needed a blu ray player and this came up for review. We are very far from the closest site so our streaming is not very good in our house, we are talking SD quality at best. The picture from a blu ray is pretty clear and sharp. DVD's even play nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Best blue ray player we’ve ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This is the best blue ray player we have ever owned. It is so easy to use. Initial set up took less than 5 minutes. The picture quality is fantastic. My kids love how easy it is to maneuver through movies and Netflix. We have never ventured out to getting an expensive blue ray. But this one is worth every penny you pay.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good Player But Premium Price
customer_reviews.text: When I spend this much on a DVD player. I would expect a bit more. Having said that, it is a good BluRay player. It plays all types of DVDs well, and the HD is beautiful on a large screen TV. The smart features are a bit challenging to get to work, and it was not as easy to set up as I would have liked. A good DVD player - but a premium price for it.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Barton
